name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】さくらみこ1st Live ＂flower fantasista!＂【#咲き誇るみこち】 [mVmWmkHltak]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Waiting screen with background music for Sakura Miko's 1st Live "Flower fantasista!".
Attendee information and precautions regarding lighting and cheering during the performance.
Information slides showcasing Sakura Miko 1st Live made-to-order merchandise.
A collection of celebratory messages and illustrations from fans (35P) for the live concert.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: さくらみこ 1st Live 受注生産グッズ
35Pのみんなからのお祝いメッセージ
